name: Web3pm.eth
bio:
co-founder and CEO of Icebreaker. Previously led product for consumer trading at Coinbase (advanced, pro, simple, dex) and before that led product for Google Analytics (built out a few businesses spanning identity and ads that contribute ~5% of revenues). Background in AI, privacy, and marketing at startups before that.
